l1->val : 0) + (l2 ? l2->val:0);\n            carry = (sum>=10 ? 1:0);\n            sum = sum%10;\n            temp = newNode(sum);\n            if(res==NULL)\n                res = temp;\n            else\n                prev2->next = temp;\n            prev2 = temp;\n            if (l1)\n                l1 = l1->next;\n            if (l2)\n                l2 = l2->next;\n            }\n            if (carry > 0)\n            temp->next = newNode(carry);\n            return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
